name: FairLLM-Education
description: A pattern for ensuring fairness in large language model technologies within educational settings.

goals.name: Fairness in Education
goals.short_description: Ensure LLM technologies promote equitable learning outcomes.
goals.long_description: This goal aims to establish that the deployment of LLM technologies in educational settings does not perpetuate or introduce biases, ensuring fair and equitable learning outcomes for all students.

context.name: Educational Context
context.long_description: The context includes various educational settings, highlighting the diversity of student backgrounds, learning preferences, and accessibility needs.

context.name: LLM Usage
context.long_description: Describes how LLM technologies are applied in educational contexts, from personalized learning assistants to content generation and assessment tools.

property_claims.name: Bias Identification and Mitigation
property_claims.short_description: Identify and mitigate biases in LLM
property_claims.long_description: Addresses the processes for identifying and mitigating biases within LLM technologies to prevent discriminatory impacts on students.

evidence.name: Bias Audit Report
evidence.long_description: Detailed report of the bias audit conducted on the LLM technology, including methodologies, findings, and mitigation strategies.

property_claims.name: Accessibility and Inclusion
property_claims.short_description: Ensure LLM is accessible to all students
property_claims.long_description: Ensures that LLM technologies are accessible to all students, including those with disabilities, to promote inclusive education.

evidence.name: Accessibility Compliance Certificate
evidence.long_description: Certificate issued by an independent body confirming that the LLM technology meets established accessibility standards.

property_claims.name: Educational Equity
property_claims.long_description: Demonstrates how LLM technologies support equitable educational opportunities and outcomes across diverse student populations.

evidence.name: Equity Impact Study
evidence.short_description: Study on LLM's impact on educational equity
evidence.long_description: A comprehensive study assessing the impact of LLM technologies on educational equity, highlighting benefits and areas for improvement.

comments.author: Ethics Board Chair
comments.text: Review the bias mitigation strategies for completeness.
